attributes.action: prevent private car hire vehicles (pch) from ever using bus lanes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: private car hire vehicles which is a different name for mini-cabs should never be allowed to use bus lanes because they are already congested enough with buses, licensed taxis, whose drivers have completed the knowledge and are professional people.  Bus lanes are also used by cyclists. London would grind to a halt if cars were also allowed in bus lanes.  anyone could put a false ariel on their car and use the bus lane.
